answers.b: The smallest possible change in the output voltage
answers.c: Measure of the difference between the actual output voltage and the expected output voltage

questions.question: The output if a 2-input gate is 1 if and only if its input are unequal it is true for

answers.a: Equal increment in input gives equal increment in output
answers.b: Difference between actual output and measure output
answers.c: Smallest possible change in the output voltage as a fraction or percentage of full scale output voltage

questions.question: The practical use of binary-weighted digital-to-analog converters is limited to:

answers.a: Smallest possible change in the output voltage as a fraction or percentage of full scale output voltage.
answers.b: Difference between actual output and measure output
answers.c: Equal increment in input gives equal increment in output
